data.comment: The match has started.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
In the minute 1, Granada’s Yangel Herrera is on his feet again at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Cadiz.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Cadiz's Jose Mari misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cadiz.
In the minute 9, Granada have a goal kick.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
In the minute 12, Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Cadiz have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 16, Granada have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Cadiz.
Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Granada are coming forward and Yangel Herrera gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Cadiz a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Granada throw-in in Cadiz's half.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Granada.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 25, Attention is being given to Cadiz’s Isaac Carcelen and play has been suspended briefly.
Corner awarded to Granada.
Alvaro Cervera (Cadiz) has taken off Isaac Carcelen who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Ivan Alejo is the replacement.
In the minute 27, Goal! Granada have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from German Sanchez.
Robert Kenedy instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Granada at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 30, Can Granada capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cadiz's half?
Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 33, Granada to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
Throw-in Granada.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
So close for Granada as Robert Kenedy's shot comes back off the post.
Cadiz drives forward and Anthony Lozano gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 42, Cadiz's Jorge Pombo breaks free at Estadio Ramon de Carranza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 43, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Granada in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Javier Alberola Rojas awards the away team a throw-in.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Granada a goal kick.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Jose Mari (Cadiz) has received a first yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Yangel Herrera.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Alvaro Cervera is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Ramon de Carranza with Alberto Perea replacing Jose Mari.
The home team replace Jorge Pombo with Alvaro Gimenez.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Ivan Alejo.
That's a fine assist from Alvaro Gimenez.
In the minute 50, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Granada's Antonio Puertas gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick Cadiz.
In the minute 53, German Sanchez (Granada) has received a yellow card from Javier Alberola Rojas.
Cadiz drive upfield and Anthony Lozano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Granada defender.
In the minute 55, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a Cadiz throw-in in Granada's half.
Granada have a goal kick.
Jorge Molina (Granada) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 57, The match at Estadio Ramon de Carranza has been interrupted briefly for a check on Salvi Sanchez, who is down injured.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 59, Salvi Sanchez has recovered and rejoins the match in Cadiz.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cadiz.
Alfonso Espino for Cadiz has been booked by Javier Alberola Rojas and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 61, Javier Alberola Rojas signals a free kick to Cadiz.
Alberto Perea for Cadiz gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Granada have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Roberto Soldado is replacing Jorge Molina for the away team.
Diego Martinez (Granada) is making a second substitution, with Darwin Machis replacing Robert Kenedy.
Throw-in Cadiz.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Granada in the half of Cadiz.
Granada have been awarded a corner by Javier Alberola Rojas.
Goal kick for Granada at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Cadiz is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Granada.
Granada to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
In the minute 71, Granada awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Cadiz to check on Salvi Sanchez, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 78, Cadiz make their fourth substitution with Augusto Fernandez replacing Salvi Sanchez.
Granada's Jesus Vallejo is whistled for offside at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Cadiz.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Granada.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Domingos Duarte is on a sub for Luis Milla for Granada.
Javier Alberola Rojas waits before resuming play because Alberto Perea for Cadiz is still down.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
In the minute 86, Cadiz's Alberto Perea looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Cadiz to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
Free kick for Cadiz in the half of Granada.
In the minute 89, Cadiz are pushing forward but Anthony Lozano's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Cadiz.
8 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Cadiz.
In Cadiz Cadiz attack through Alfonso Espino. The finish is off target, however.
Javier Alberola Rojas awards Granada a goal kick.
Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
The home team have replaced Anthony Lozano with Filip Malbasic. This is the fifth substitution made today by Alvaro Cervera.
Luis Suarez is replacing Antonio Puertas for Granada at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
